attributes.review: it took all of my storage!! all 128gbs of it! once i opened the app it uninstalled all the rest of my apps just to make room for this horrible app,and it didn't stop there! I then began to get non stop notifications from the app to the point that my phone overheated and died. I am now back on my ipod due to this nightmare of and app.😭

attributes.review: This app was absolutely deplorable. Nothing about it seemed genuine the news was biased and on multiple occasions it would crash and I would have to restart. This app was so bad I couldn’t handle it for more than a day before I ended up just deleting. If I could I would give it 0 stars for how much of a pain this trash app was. DO NOT DOWNLOAD FOR YOUR OWN SAKE😡
